title: List of all Androidvideo call   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidvideo call   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: CallService-sample
repoList.description: Video calling library for Android - sample application

repoList.description: Use Sinch Library

repoList.description: Bandyer's android core library for audio&video communication

repoList.description: An android app for video calling using open-tok library

repoList.name: REST-API-CALL-ANDROID
repoList.description: This is rest client to call webservice or API. You can easily get data from the server using REST CLIENT. File uploading, image uploading and video uploading is easy using this REST CLIENT. It contains with okhttp library.
